name: fastapi-initializr-react
description: React-based FastAPI project generator with no build step required
author: FastAPI Initializr

notes.no-install-needed: This project uses CDN versions of React, ReactDOM, Babel, and JSZip
notes.how-to-run: Just run 'python -m http.server 8080' and open http://localhost:8080/public/
notes.browser-requirements: Modern browser with ES6 module support
notes.why-no-build: Uses Babel Standalone for JSX transformation in the browser
